title: The existence of a minimal element in certain classes

blocks.name: bnj69
blocks.content: Existence of a minimal element in certain classes: if ` R ` is well-founded and set-like on ` A ` , then every nonempty subclass of ` A ` has a minimal element. The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory. See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj69(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bnj1189(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  biid(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  biid(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  biid(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))
  diff.w-bnj15.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c2, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))
  diff.w-bnj15.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.wne.s(s1, c2, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnj69(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bnj1189(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, (c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s1[c0]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  biid((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅))
  biid((s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s1[c0]s0))
  biid(∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0[_FrSe]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ≠ ∅)
  diff.w-bnj15.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c2, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, c0[_FrSe]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ≠ ∅)
  diff.w-bnj15.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.wne.s(s1, c2, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: bnj1228
blocks.content: Existence of a minimal element in certain classes: if ` R ` is well-founded and set-like on ` A ` , then every nonempty subclass of ` A ` has a minimal element. The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory. See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj1228(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  sylibr(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))))
  bnj69(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  cbvexv1(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfral(s0, s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))
  nfcii(s0, s2, c2)
  nfv(s0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  ralbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  df-rex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  df-rex(hs0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnj1228(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ (s2 ∈ c2 → ∀(s0, s2 ∈ c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0))), d(s1, s2))
  sylibr((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)))
  bnj69(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  3bitr4i(∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0))), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0))))
  cbvexv1(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)))
  nfan(s0, hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfral(s0, s1, c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)
  nfcii(s0, s2, c2)
  nfv(s0, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0), hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  ralbidv(s1, c2, s0 = hs0, ¬ s1[c0]s0, ¬ s1[c0]hs0)
  notbid(s0 = hs0, s1[c0]s0, s1[c0]hs0)
  breq2(s0, hs0, s1, c0)
  df-rex(s0, c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  df-rex(hs0, c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)))
  diff.wn.s(s0, s1[c0]hs0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
